subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The 2013 trade with the Celtics for Paul Pierce and Kevin Garnett may not be the worst in Nets history, but since future draft picks are involved, there is still time.
snippet: The 2013 trade with the Celtics for Paul Pierce and Kevin Garnett may not be the worst in Nets history, but since future draft picks are involved, there is still time.
